summary: At an intersection, a scooter suddenly appears from a blind spot and falls directly in front of the camera vehicle
actions: The camera vehicle is stationary at an intersection. A scooter suddenly appears from the right, attempts a turn, and falls directly in the path of the camera vehicle
characters: Scooter rider, pedestrians, various vehicles at intersection
key_objects: Intersection, scooter, camera vehicle, road markings, traffic signals
key_actions: ghost probing - scooter suddenly appearing from blind spot on the right side and creating immediate hazard
next_action: Camera vehicle needs to brake or maneuver to avoid the fallen scooter
